description: Returns the projected utilization metrics of Amazon EC2 instance recommendations.

parameters.name: instanceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instances for which to return recommendation projected metrics.

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: The statistic of the projected metrics.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The granularity, in seconds, of the projected metrics data points.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The timestamp of the first projected metrics data point to return.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The timestamp of the last projected metrics data point to return.

parameters.name: recommendationPreferences
parameters.description: An object to specify the preferences for the Amazon EC2 recommendation projected metrics to return in the response. cpuVendorArchitectures (list) --- Specifies the CPU vendor and architecture for Amazon EC2 instance and Auto Scaling group recommendations. For example, when you specify AWS_ARM64 with: A  GetEC2InstanceRecommendations or  GetAutoScalingGroupRecommendations request, Compute Optimizer returns recommendations that consist of Graviton instance types only. A  GetEC2RecommendationProjectedMetrics request, Compute Optimizer returns projected utilization metrics for Graviton instance type recommendations only. A  ExportEC2InstanceRecommendations or  ExportAutoScalingGroupRecommendations request, Compute Optimizer exports recommendations that consist of Graviton instance types only. (string) ---

nested_params.name: cpuVendorArchitectures
nested_params.description: Specifies the CPU vendor and architecture for Amazon EC2 instance and Auto Scaling group recommendations. For example, when you specify AWS_ARM64 with:

nested_items.name: recommendedOptionProjectedMetrics
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describes projected metrics.

nested_items.name: rank
nested_items.description: The rank of the recommendation option projected metric.

nested_items.name: projectedMetrics
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe a projected utilization metric.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the projected utilization metric.

Cpu - The projected percentage of allocated EC2 compute units that would be in use on the recommendation option had you used that resource during the analyzed period. This metric identifies the processing power required to run an application on the recommendation option. Depending on the instance type, tools in your operating system can show a lower percentage than CloudWatch when the instance is not allocated a full processor core.

Memory - The percentage of memory that would be in use on the recommendation option had you used that resource during the analyzed period. This metric identifies the amount of memory required to run an application on the recommendation option. Units: Percent.

nested_items.name: timestamps
nested_items.description: The timestamps of the projected utilization metric.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The values of the projected utilization metrics.
